I was looking at a running instance of Heritrix with jconsole and
playing a=
round with the controls and had a few questions.

Adding new jobs:
When add=
ing a job using the "addJob" or "addJobBasedOn" openMBeans, is
it possible =
to add more than one URL? I noticed that the seeds
attribute description sa=
ys "Initial seed(s)". I have tried ways of
entering multiple seeds through =
jconsole, and none have worked. I have
tried separating the URLs with space=
, typing the newline escape char
\n, typing the enter key (which just activ=
ated the action). Is there a
limitation with jconsole's UI that makes it im=
possible to submit
multiple seeds with a new job? i.e. Could i connect to H=
eritrix with
JMX from my own app and pass a java string like
"http://www.do=
main1.com\nhttp://www.domain2.com\n ... " as the seed?

Starting new instan=
ces:
There is a button labeled start() in jconsole for Heritrix and has a
d=
escription of "Start Heritrix instance". I have clicked this button
expecti=
ng a new instance of Heritrix to be started, but nothing
happens. Does this=
 button do something else, or am I not using it
right? I have started Herit=
rix on the command line. What steps have to
be taken to make the start() me=
thod actually start a new instance of
Heritrix through JMX?

Thank you much=
,
badswalu
